document_title: Genital warts in women: Causes, symptoms, treatment and prevention
subsection_name: sui-mao-ga-o-nu.json_5_Do genital warts in women cause pain?
subsection_content:
Surely when you get sick, you will experience some unpleasant symptoms caused by the disease. First of all, the symptoms of itching and burning pain make it difficult for women to carry out daily activities and cause self-consciousness in daily communication. If left untreated for a long time, the disease can affect the quality of life as well as the quality of work.
Therefore, Dr. Nguyen Duc Hinh recommends that women should not be afraid, go immediately to the hospital for examination, and frankly present to the doctor for advice and find a suitable treatment method.
